title: France calls on EU for new sanctions on Russia for its disinformation campaign

On April 25, the European Parliament adopted a resolution on the presidential election in Russia. The European Parliament called these elections undemocratic and deemed the […]

title: European Parliament calls for considering Putin’s “election” illegitimate
